title: Exploring the association between ambient air pollution and COVID-19 risk: A comprehensive meta-analysis with meta-regression modelling
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Harry Asena Musonye, Yi-Sheng He, Merga Bayou Bekele, Ling-Qiong Jiang, Fan Cao, Yi-Qing Xu, Zhao-Xing Gao, Man Ge, Tian He, Peng Zhang, Chan-Na Zhao, Cong Chen, Peng Wang, Hai-Feng Pan
